translations: 重新发现，重新找到（rediscover 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: One doctor thinks he has rediscovered an old weapon that could be useful in the fight against these nasties. It is honey.
sentences.translation: 有一位医生认为，他已重新找到了一种古老的武器，可以用来抵御这些“讨厌的家伙”。这就是蜂蜜。

sentences.sentence: So a lot of these things were rediscovered.
sentences.translation: 这样一大批手稿得以重见天日。

sentences.sentence: Each rediscovered gesture reveals me to myself.
sentences.translation: 每次重新发现一种身体动作我就多认识自己一分。
